addDate.label: Add Date
addDate.description: Date and time in which a record was added.

beginDate.label: Begin Date
beginDate.description: Date in which information became effective or activity started.

beginHour.label: Begin Hour
beginHour.description: Hour in which information became effective or activity started.

beginMinute.label: Begin Minute
beginMinute.description: Minute in which information became effective or activity started.

code.label: Code
code.description: Code used to uniquely identify datacolumns used in a report.

accountType.label: Account Type Code
accountType.description: Code for the type of allowance account.

ceParam.label: CE Parameter Code
ceParam.description: Code for the pollutant minimized by the respective control equipment or method.

controlTechnology.label: Control Code
controlTechnology.description: Code for the method or equipment used by the combustion unit to minimize emissions for the particular pollutant.

dataSet.label: Dataset Code
dataSet.description: Code used to uniquely identify a dataset. Use /list methods for full list available.

fuelType.label: Fuel Type Code
fuelType.description: Code for the type of fuel combusted by the unit.

masterData.label: Dataset Code
masterData.description: Primary indentifier of a dataset for Master Data codes & descriptions. Use /list method for full list available.

relationships.label: Dataset Code
relationships.description: Primary indentifier of a dataset for Master Data relationships. Use /list method for full list available.

report.label: Report Code
report.description: Code used to uniquely identify a report dataset.

program.label: Program Code
program.description: Code for statutory or regulatory based options for tracking and reducing air pollution emissions.

unitType.label: Unit Type Code
unitType.description: Code for the unit or boiler type.

dataType.label: Data Type
dataType.description: The type of data being requested.

dataSubType.label: Data Subtype
dataSubType.description: The subtype of emissions data being requested.

accountType.label: Account Type Description
accountType.description: Full description for the type of allowance account.

ceParam.label: CE Parameter Description
ceParam.description: Full description for the pollutant minimized by the respective control equipment or method.

controlTechnology.label: Control Description
controlTechnology.description: Full description of method or equipment used by the combustion unit to minimize emissions for the particular pollutant.

fuelType.label: Fuel Type Description
fuelType.description: Full description for the type of fuel combusted by the unit.

program.label: Program Description
program.description: Full description for statutory or regulatory based options for tracking and reducing air pollution emissions.

reportingPeriod.description: Year and Quarter description for a reporting period.

unitType.label: Unit Type Description
unitType.description: Full description for the unit or boiler type.

displayName.label: Display Name
displayName.description: The displayed name of a data record.

dataSet.description: The displayed name of a dataset record.

dataTable.description: The displayed name of a datatable record.

dataColumn.description: The displayed name of a datacolumn record.

endDate.label: End Date
endDate.description: Date in which information is no longer effective or activity ended.

endHour.label: End Hour
endHour.description: Hour in which information is no longer effective or activity ended.

endMinute.label: End Minute
endMinute.description: Minute in which information is no longer effective or activity ended.

exclude.label: Exclude
exclude.description: Parameter used to exclude records containg data for the selected values.

accountType.description: Parameter used to exclude the selected Account Type codes from the response.

program.description: Parameter used to exclude the selected Program codes from the response.

groupCode.label: Group Code
groupCode.description: Code for the group the data is associated with.

accountType.label: Account Type Group Code
accountType.description: Code for the group to which the allowance account belongs.

fuelType.label: Fuel Group Code
fuelType.description: Code for the fuel group for the type of fuel combusted by the unit.

program.label: Program Group Code
program.description: Code for the group to which the program belongs.

unitType.label: Unit Type Group Code
unitType.description: Code for the unit or boiler type group.

groupDescription.label: Group Description
groupDescription.description: Description of the group for which master data records are associated.

accountType.label: Account Type Group Description
accountType.description: Full description for the group to which the allowance account belongs.

fuelType.label: Fuel Group Description
fuelType.description: Full description for the fuel group for the type of fuel combusted by the unit.

program.label: Program Group Description
program.description: Full description for the group to which the program belongs.

unitType.label: Unit Type Group Description
unitType.description: Full description for the unit or boiler group.

id.label: Record Id
id.description: Primary unique identifier of a record.

bookmark.label: Bookmark Id
bookmark.description: Primary unique identifier of a CAMPD bookmark query.

submission.label: Activity Id
submission.description: CDX Activity Id of a CROMMER signed & submitted dataset.

name.label: Name
name.description: The name or identifier of a data record.

account.label: Account Name
account.description: The name of the account in which allowances are held.

bulkFile.label: Filename
bulkFile.description: The filename of a bulk file dataset in S3 for the CAMPD application.

dataColumn.description: The name of a column used in a master data query.

noResultsMessage.label: No Results Message
noResultsMessage.description: The message to be displayed when no results are returned.
noResultsMessage.example: Data does not exist for the provided criteria.

dataSet.example: Monitor Plan data does not exist for the provided criteria.

dataTable.example: Location Attribute does not exist for this monitor plan.

order.label: Order
order.description: The order in which records are sorted and returned.

quarter.label: Quarter
quarter.description: The calendar quarter data became effective, was collected, or associated with.

updateDate.label: Update Date
updateDate.description: Date and time in which a record was last updated.

year.label: Year
year.description: The calendar year data became effective, was collected, or associated with.
